headline: Axon to Release First Quarter 2025 Earnings on May 7, 2025
summary: Axon (Nasdaq: AXON), the global public safety technology leader, today announced that it will report first quarter 2025 financial results after the market closes on Wednesday, May 7, 2025. Axon will host a live Zoom video webinar to discuss the company's financial results at 5 p.m. ET that same day.

headline: Why Is Everyone Talking About Axon Enterprise Stock?
summary: In February, Axon Enterprise (NASDAQ: AXON) reported full-year 2024 revenue of $2.1 billion, marking its third consecutive year with over 30% top-line growth.  Axon is not just any tech company.  Best known for its less-than-lethal TASER, the company now supplies law enforcement agencies and other customers with a complete platform revolving around public safety.
